mapper.select: SELECT a.id as "id", a.name as "name", a.en_name as "enName", b.en_name AS "parentName", a.parent_id as "parentId", a.sort as "sort" FROM sys_column a INNER JOIN sys_column b ON a.parent_id=b.id WHERE a.parent_id in ('3','4') ORDER BY a.sort DESC
SELECT a.id as "id", a.name as "name", a.en_name as "enName", a.parent_id as "parentId", a.sort as "sort" FROM sys_column a WHERE a.id in ('3','4') ORDER BY a.sort DESC
